name: #ZodiacSeries: SCORPIO
description:
by aldillalaras

Scorpio today:
 
Take time for the pause, if you need one. Not every situation is meant to be pursued vigorously and quickly. Some take a bit more time and without a strong energetic foundation inside you, it will be hard to commit even to some simple daily tasks and routines.

Ask yourself where your energy is drained, and which piece of your life takes a lot of it while not returning any. It is important to turn to childlike choices and playful times instead of merely swimming through difficulty. (www.astrology-zodiac-signs.com)

/ 

This is the first artwork from #ZodiacSeries by aldillalaras.
